Test Server query operation for HCIM Patient
Test XIS server to serve Patient resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 1 Patient resource(s).
Check if the previous operation results in a FHIR Patient that contains the values that are expected following Nictiz' materials (fixture .id: HANNAHXXX-KOOIJ)
Response Bundle contains exactly 1 Patient
Patient resource evaluated in the previous assert contains an .id
Contains .meta with .profile 'http://fhir.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-patient'
Contains .identifier with .system and .value

Contains .name with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-assembly-order' with .valueCode 'NL1' and .text with a value, and .family with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-name' with .valueString with a value, and .given with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-EN-qualifier' with .valueCode 'BR', and .given with a value and with .extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-EN-qualifier' with .valueCode 'IN'. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Patient).where(id = '${HANNAHXXX-KOOIJ-id}').name.where(extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-assembly-order').value.ofType(code) = 'NL1' and text.hasValue() and family.where($this.hasValue() and extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-own-name').value.ofType(string).hasValue()) and given.where($this.hasValue() and extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-EN-qualifier').value.ofType(code) = 'BR') and given.where($this.hasValue() and extension('http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/iso21090-EN-qualifier').value.ofType(code) = 'IN')).exists()

description.value: Contains .name.extension with url 'http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/humanname-assembly-order' with .valueCode 'NL1'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .name.text with a value. This assert checks only one child. Assert 1-3 checks if all children are present in the same parent. This assert only checks existence of a value, because string comparisons can have many possible caveats

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Encounter).where(id = '${0d47afdc-2063-11ec-1749-020000000000-id}').participant.where(individual.where(extension('http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/practitionerrole-reference').value.ofType(Reference).where((reference or identifier) and display) and (reference or identifier) and display)).exists()

description.value: Contains .period with .start and .end
Contains .diagnosis with .condition with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Test Server query operation for Observations
Test XIS server to serve Observation resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Observation resource(s) with code http://loinc.org | 11977-6. (parity)
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Observation resource(s) with code http://loinc.org | 11996-6. (gravidity)
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Observation resource(s) with code http://snomed.info/sct | 161714006. (term date)

description.value: Test Server query operation for Observations
Test XIS server to serve Observation resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Observation resource(s) with code http://loinc.org | 29463-7. (body weight)
Confirm that the returned searchset Bundle contains 1 Observation resource(s) with code http://loinc.org | 85354-9. (blood pressure)

Contains .meta with .profile 'http://fhir.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-observation' and .profile 'http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-BodyWeight'
Contains .identifier with .system and .value
Contains .status 'final'
Contains .category with .coding with .system 'http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-category' and .code 'vital-signs' and .display
Contains .code with .coding with .system 'http://loinc.org' and .code '29463-7' and .display
Contains .subject with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .context with either .reference or .identifier and .display
Contains .effectivePeriod with .start and .end
Contains .valueQuantity with .value '63' and .unit and .system 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and .code 'kg'

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${d735d999-2062-11ec-2089-020000000000-id}').value.ofType(Quantity).where(value = 63 and unit and system = 'http://unitsofmeasure.org' and code = 'kg').exists()

Contains .component with .code with .coding with .system 'http://loinc.org' and .code '8480-6' and .display, and .valueQuantity with .value '95'. This assert checks if all children exist (if applicable with their specific values) and if they are present within one element. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

expression.value: Bundle.entry.resource.ofType(Observation).where(id = '${d735d995-2062-11ec-2089-020000000000-id}').component.where(code.coding.where(system = 'http://loinc.org' and code = '8480-6' and display) and value.ofType(Quantity).value = 95).exists()

description.value: Contains .component.code with .coding with .system 'http://loinc.org' and .code '8480-6' and .display. This assert checks only one child. Assert 2-9 checks if all children are present in the same parent
Contains .component.valueQuantity with .value '95'. This assert checks only one child. Assert 2-9 checks if all children are present in the same parent

Contains .component with .code with .coding with .system 'http://loinc.org' and .code '8462-4' and .display, and .valueQuantity with .value '50'. Following asserts check if individual children exist to help you debug if this assert fails

Test Server query operation for Procedures
Test XIS server to serve Procedure resources.
Confirm that HTTP header Authorization contains the patient token ${patient-token-id}
Confirm that the operation was successful
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.
Confirm that the returned Bundle type is searchset.

Confirm that all returned resources contain an Resource.id except when temporary ids are used in the Bundle. The only time that a resource does not have an id is when it is being submitted to the server using a create operation: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/STU3/resource-definitions.html#Resource.id
Confirm that all returned resources except OperationOutcome and Binary contain a meta.profile tag.
Confirm that the fullUrl does not disagree with the id in the resource, see http://hl7.org/fhir/stu3/bundle-definitions.html#Bundle.entry.fullUrl
Confirm that the fullUrl is an absolute URL, an uuid or an oid.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.fullUrl.all( startsWith('http://') or startsWith('https://') or matches('^urn:oid:[0-2](\\.(0|[1-9]\\d*))*$') or matches('^urn:uuid:[A-Fa-f\\d]{8}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{4}-[A-Fa-f\\d]{12}$') )

description.value: Confirm that the returned Bundle conforms to the base FHIR specification and the resources to the stated profiles in the meta.profile tag.
Confirm that all Coding elements contain both a .system and a .code.
Confirm that the OID of the zib valueset is not used for the system of a coding element.

Confirm that all CodeableConcept elements contain either a coding.display or a text value if no Coding exists or has an extension (e.g. a nullFlavor or data-absent-reason extension). For more information see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3Use_of_coded_concepts.
Confirm that all References have a display value, see https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/FHIR:V1.0_FHIR_IG_STU3#Use_of_the_reference_datatype.

Confirm that all Identifiers have both a .system and a .value. In rare cases where a general category of identifiers can be used, .type can replace .system. Edge cases for both .system and .type to be unknown are not applicable to Nictiz. For more information, see https://www.hl7.org/fhir/stu3/datatypes.html#Identifier.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) anywhere.
Confirm that the returned Bundle total value matches or is less than the number of entries in the Bundle. The included resources should not be counted as entries in the Bundle.total.
Confirm that the returned Bundle contains a self link.
Confirm that Bundle does not use Burgerservicenummer (BSN) in the self link.
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 3 Procedure resource(s).
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 0 Organization resource(s).
Confirm that the response Bundle contains 0 ProcedureRequest resource(s).
